docs.title: Welcome to the Spatial Omics Live Review
docs.text: This site provides a dynamic exploration of spatial omics literature and data.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Spatial Omics Applications
docs.text: This section reviews diverse applications of spatial omics, allowing for interactive filtering.

docs.title: The Spatial Omics Book
docs.text: Welcome to the theoretical text section. Chapter outlines and content will go here.

docs.title: Spatial Omics Datasets
docs.text: Here you will find information and links to various spatial omics datasets.

docs.title: Spatial Omics Methods
docs.text: Explore different methodologies used in spatial omics research.
